ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: yeah, highly recommended. a very good course to learn the practical aspects of biophysics
It provide you with some basic idea of biophysics and biochemistry methods and also general description of macromolecules.
Macro II is a very good overview of many topics in biophysics and biochemistry. I would definitely recommend it to another student.
It is a good class and a must-take for a biochemist/biophysicist. It is not easy, but it is not too hard either.
This course would be very helpful for biochemical/biophysics students and demands firm foundation in biophsyics. Its helpfulness would be limited for students who study mainly biology.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: it helps me to gain the background knowledge of the modern biophysical techniques
It taught me a lot of techniques that I wasn't particularly familiar with before that it is very possible I may now consider using for my research.
The class provided a fundamental understanding for many potential fields. The knowledge of techniques and topics will be useful for my research.
I think that this course will be extremely valuable for my dissertation.The subject material is great, but there is room for improvement in the course.
This course exposed me to the various biophysical methods available, and is helpful for me to consider collaborating with biophysicists for certain problems in my research.
